Text: hi, it is possible to directly copy it into PS3 without burning it? i mean just copy all files from iso into backupmanager folder in PS3? can anybody try it and tell us if it works with PSjailbreak USB or one of its clones (X3jailbreak, PS3key, PS3stinger, etc.)??? thanks

@mr.spok you can but need a sort of external HD or your own from ps3 connected via usb to sata.
